sqlMap.select:
select
temp.usercenter, temp.lingjbh, temp.zhizlx, temp.shiycj, temp.danw, sum(temp.j0) as j0, sum(temp.j1) as j1, sum(temp.j2) as j2, sum(temp.j3) as j3, sum(temp.j4) as j4, sum(temp.j5) as j5, sum(temp.j6) as j6, sum(temp.j7) as j7, sum(temp.j8) as j8, sum(temp.j9) as j9, sum(temp.j10) as j10, sum(temp.j11) as j11, sum(temp.j12) as j12, sum(temp.j13) as j13, sum(temp.j14) as j14, sum(temp.j15) as j15, temp.xuqcfrq, temp.j0riq, temp.j1riq, temp.j2riq, temp.j3riq, temp.j4riq, temp.j5riq, temp.j6riq, temp.j7riq, temp.j8riq, temp.j9riq, temp.j10riq, temp.j11riq, temp.j12riq, temp.j13riq, temp.j14riq, temp.j15riq, temp.cangkdm, temp.cangklx, temp.lujbh, temp.beihzq, temp.yunszq, temp.zhidgys, temp.waibghms, temp.fahd from ( select distinct m.usercenter, m.lingjbh, m.zhizlx, cl.fenpqbh as fenpxh, m.shiycj, m.danw, (m.j0 * cl.xiaohbl) as j0, (m.j1 * cl.xiaohbl) as j1, (m.j2 * cl.xiaohbl) as j2, (m.j3 * cl.xiaohbl) as j3, (m.j4 * cl.xiaohbl) as j4, (m.j5 * cl.xiaohbl) as j5, (m.j6 * cl.xiaohbl) as j6, (m.j7 * cl.xiaohbl) as j7, (m.j8 * cl.xiaohbl) as j8, (m.j9 * cl.xiaohbl) as j9, (m.j10 * cl.xiaohbl) as j10, (m.j11 * cl.xiaohbl) as j11, (m.j12 * cl.xiaohbl) as j12, (m.j13 * cl.xiaohbl) as j13, (m.j14 * cl.xiaohbl) as j14, (m.j15 * cl.xiaohbl) as j15, m.xuqcfrq, m.j0riq, m.j1riq, m.j2riq, m.j3riq, m.j4riq, m.j5riq, m.j6riq, m.j7riq, m.j8riq, m.j9riq, m.j10riq, m.j11riq, m.j12riq, m.j13riq, m.j14riq, m.j15riq, case when cw.dinghck is null then cw.xianbck else cw.dinghck end as cangkdm, case when cw.dinghck is null then 0 else 1 end as cangklx, cw.lujbh, cw.beihzq, cw.yunszq, cw.zhidgys, cw.waibms as waibghms, cw.fahd from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd cl, ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzj m, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_WULLJ cw where 1 = 1 and m.usercenter = cl.usercenter and m.lingjbh = cl.lingjbh and m.chanx = cl.shengcxbh and m.usercenter = cw.usercenter and m.lingjbh = cw.lingjbh and cl.fenpqbh = cw.fenpqh and m.zhizlx = cw.zhizlx and sysdate > to_date(cl.shengxr,'yyyy-mm-dd') and sysdate < to_date(cl.jiesr,'yyyy-mm-dd') ) temp group by temp.usercenter, temp.lingjbh, temp.zhizlx, temp.shiycj, temp.danw, temp.xuqcfrq, temp.j0riq, temp.j1riq, temp.j2riq, temp.j3riq, temp.j4riq, temp.j5riq, temp.j6riq, temp.j7riq, temp.j8riq, temp.j9riq, temp.j10riq, temp.j11riq, temp.j12riq, temp.j13riq, temp.j14riq, temp.j15riq, temp.cangkdm, temp.cangklx, temp.lujbh, temp.beihzq, temp.yunszq, temp.zhidgys, temp.waibghms, temp.fahd

select ID, USERCENTER, LINGJBH, FENPXH, ZHIZLX, SHIYCJ, DANW, J0, J1, J2, J3, J4, J5, J6, J7, J8, J9, J10, J11, J12, J13, J14, J15, XUQCFRQ, J0RIQ, CANGKDM, CANGKLX, LUJBH, JIAOFM, BEIHZQ, YUNSZQ, GONGYS, ZHIDGYS, WAIBGHMS, FAHD from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_maoxqhzjfpxh where 1=1
